project1.title: NextLevel Food
project1.description: A full-stack Next.js app where users can share their own meal recipes by submitting images and descriptions through a secure form. Input is sanitized using xss and slugify to prevent attacks.

project2.title: Recycling & Waste Management System
project2.description: The project focuses on making recycling more efficient by working with existing infrastructure. Aims to replace monthly reports with up-to-date statistics and data visualizations.

project3.title: Nexter: Real Estate Website
project3.description: A responsive real estate layout built with SCSS, using a modular BEM-based architecture and custom media queries. Emphasizes maintainability with structured partials and advanced CSS Grid.

project4.title: Pokédex
project4.description: A React-based Pokédex that fetches real-time data from the PokéAPI. Users can browse, search, and view detailed stats for individual Pokémon with intuitive card navigation.

project5.title: Elegant Context: Webshop
project5.description: A modern looking e-commerce app built with React and Context API for global state management. Features a real-time cart system and a smooth, modal-based checkout flow

project6.title: Project Management App
project6.description: A project management app built with React and styled using Tailwind CSS. Users can create projects, assign tasks, and manage them.

project7.title: Timer Challenge
project7.description: A React app that challenges users to stop a countdown timer as accurately as possible. Uses useRef, useImperativeHandle, and React Portals to manage a reusable modal for real-time performance feedback.

project8.title: Trillo: Hotel Booking Website
project8.description: A responsive web layout styled with SCSS, featuring a modular architecture with reusable components and maintainable styles. Built using BEM methodology and SCSS.

project9.title: Tic Tac Toe
project9.description: A classic two-player Tic Tac Toe game built with React. It features a simple win-check algorithm. Designed for simplicity and learning, with a clean and intuitive UI.

rnm.title: Rick and Morty Characters
rnm.description: A React-based web application that lets users search, browse, and expand character profiles from the Rick and Morty API. This app delivers a table view of characters, expandable rows for deeper insights, and pagination.

reactMUI.title: React Material-UI Project
reactMUI.description: A React social meadial page built with Material-UI, with a responsive layout, interactive elements, and a user-friendly interface. I used this project to get familiar with Material-UI components and styling.

holidayPlacepicker.title: Holiday Placepicker
holidayPlacepicker.description: Allows users to select a holiday destination from a map. It uses location to arange the selection and display the list based on the closest holiday places. Also uses local storage to save the selected places.

reactQuiz.title: React Quiz App
reactQuiz.description: A React-based quiz application that allows you to take a quiz on React. It features a timer, score tracking, and a user-friendly interface.
